alert.note: Alert for Eastern Santa Clara Hills; Mountains Of San Benito County And Interior Monterey County Including Pinnacles National Park; Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley and Carmel Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 29 at 4:28PM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A shower producing small hail will impact portions of southeastern Santa Clara and north central San Benito Counties through 500 PM PDT... At 428 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a shower producing small hail near Hollister, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Santa Clara and north central San Benito Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Santa Clara Hills; Mountains Of San Benito County And Interior Monterey County Including Pinnacles National Park; Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley and Carmel Valley
